name: com.magicleap.mrtk
description: An extension to provide compatibility with Magic Leap features such as hand tracking and 6dof controller support, to Microsoft's Mixed reality Toolkit (MRTK).

samples.displayName: Eye Tracking Example - Requires MRTK Examples Package
samples.description: Example scene showing how to implement Magic Leap eye tracking using MRTK

samples.displayName: Hand Interactions Example - Requires MRTK Examples Package
samples.description: Example scene showing how to implement Magic Leap hand and controller interactions using MRTK

samples.displayName: Spatial Awareness Example - Requires MRTK Examples Package
samples.description: Example scene showing how to implement Magic Leap scene meshing using MRTK
